trends: There have been no other sightings in New Alexandria
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsBright star-like object observed hovering in sky approx. 230 a.m. 101103, withlight pulsating randomly white with red and blue. Witness one observed objectwhile calling out the door for errant cat. He thought at first it was anairplane, but it didnt move for over an hour as witness one intermittentlycalled for cat. Witness one woke witness two at approximately 330 a.m. toobserve. Through binoculars, both witnesses observed bright white light brighterthan normal star with pulsating red and blue lights. Movement was then notedrelative to pine tree in yard. Object moved smoothly up and down, and left andright, as it seemed to move away from witnesses. Witness one reports object wasgone when he checked about 400 a.m. Witness two checked again at approximately500 a.m. when calling for missing cat, and thought she observed the light muchfarther away it was less bright but still pulsating on the same horizontal planebut much farther to the northeast. Missing cat came home safe that morning.
